description: Tell us your Killie XI for season opener
title: Tell us your Killie XI for season opener
title_page: Tell us your Killie XI for season opener - BBC Sport
maintext:
Kilmarnock host Rangers on the opening day of the new Scottish Premiership season, looking to defy the odds and start their campaign with a positive result.
Put yourself in Derek McInnes's shoes and tell us who you would pick to start here.
